title: Taliyah nerfed again?
body:
Wasn't she just gutted? As a tali main I'm still rocking mid (pun intended) but after minutes of gameplay she runs out of mana pretty quickly after using her E W combo and her Q doesn't even deal that much to Melee minions so what gives riot? Taliyah is pretty hard to play considering how hard it is to land your W and you have to predict most of the time. 

Don't you want people to play taliyah? she really underrated but can be a beast in lane when you use her kit properly.

replies.body: She one of the best midlaners in high elo. The nerf was for worlds.
She's not underrated, she became a top meta pick in the midlane, how's that underrated?
